QuestData.Title: Pressing Forward
QuestData.Description: Good work so far.$B$BWe should find the entrance to Grim Batol just past the next gate. I was ordered to secure the entrance and block off reinforcements while the rest of our men press through the path we've cleared up the canyon.$B$BLet's get moving down the canyon to the southwest - we should find the next gate pretty quickly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring your squad past the northern Dragonmaw Gate to the entrance of Grim Batol.$B$BIf you are separated from your squad, return to Master Mathias Shaw in Wyrms' Bend to be reassigned.
QuestData.RewardText: The gate is clear. Once your people finish clearing the canyon, we will speak to your leaders about the next move.
